availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Garrard County, Kentucky, farmer and politician. Kentucky native. Married to Eliza Denny. Farmer in Garrard County in 1850 and 1860. Member of the Senate of the Commonwealth of Kentucky from Garrard County from 1859 to 1863.

ab.bibl: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Garrard County, Division 1, p. 258. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Garrard County, p. 18. Lewis Collins and Richard H. Collins, History of Kentucky, Volume II (Covington, KY: Collins and Company, 1878), 288. Find A Grave, “George Denny, Jr (1825-1897),” Memorial #44043556, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/44043556 (accessed July 12, 2017).
